hanzi-su-wiki:
維

Значения

Нить, связывать, обновлять, реконструировать

Мнемоника

Веревочные 糸 путы для домашней птицы 隹.

Варианты

维
purpleculture_pinyin:
wéi
to preserve; to maintain; to hold together; dimension; vitamin (abbr. for 维生素 )
сохранять; поддерживать; держаться вместе; измерение; витамин (сокр. для 维生素)
rtega_mnemonic:
維維RS
维维		tie, secure, fiber, maintain
  • tied thread 糸 used to catch a bird 隹
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 维)
Pictophonetic: 隹 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
維護 [ wéi hù ]: to defend; to safeguard; to protect; to uphold; to maintain
維持 [ wéi chí ]: to keep; to maintain; to preserve
維修 [ wéi xiū ]: maintenance (of equipment); to protect and maintain
維和 [ wéi hé ]: peacekeeping
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow
heisig_chinese_memo: Spiderman eats turkey because he heard it contains fiber which he can use to maintain his spidey threads.
koohiiStory1: Hey, Spidey! Eat that turkey if you want, but make sure you eat some fibers: you want spidey threads, don´t ya?
koohiiStory2: If you want to increase your fiber intake, just leave on those threads that are used to sew up the stuffed turkey and eat them too.
jp_example_words:
繊維(せんい): fibre, fiber, textile
維持(いじ): maintenance, preservation
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You tie a piece of thread to your turkey in order to maintain proximity to it. The turkey likes to run away, so you tie a thread to it. This way you can hold the other end and maintain your turkey.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine holding onto a thread that is attached to a turkey. Feel the turkey tug against the thread as you struggle to maintain control.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The reason the turkey is struggling is because there’s an eagle (い) swooping down to attack the turkey. You try to maintain control, but once you see the eagle as well, you let go of the thread.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you and the turkey and the eagle are all bumbling about in pandemonium. You try to maintain order but it’s not possible. What a kerfuffle.
Ru_Radicals: 小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить), 隹 (старая птица)
Ru_trainchinese:
wéi: (сущ) (матем.) измерение
wéi: (графема) сохранять; держать вместе; мысль, мышление
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the little bird's (隹) thread (糸) is a fiber
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Spiderman aka 'threads', maintains a good relationship with the turkeys next to his house.  They gobble really loud when trouble is coming.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscriptions from " shito " and "隹" sound, will tie the bird with a rope (Ma Xulun), the original meaning is tied. "poetry. Xiaoya. "White Horse": "Yizhiweizhi", Mao Heng's biography: "Maintenance, tie."

The original meaning of " wei " is to tie, and by extension, the rope that tie objects is also called " wei ", "Yi Li. "Da Shot": "Zhongli Weigang", Zheng Xuan's note: "Hou has the upper and lower Gang, and the evil that makes the horns of the tongue is Wei." "Astronomy": "The pillars of the sky are broken, and the earth is destroyed." It is extended from the tie system to maintain and maintain. The rules and guidelines for maintaining order are also called " maintenance ." "tube. Herdsmen": "The four dimensions of state-owned...One is ritual, second is righteousness, third is integrity, and fourth is shame."

Bronze writing is used as a person's name.

"Shuowen": "Wei, Che Gaiwei. From Shito, Yisheng." Duan Yucai's note: "Extendedly, those who are related to each other are called Wei."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscriptions from " shito " and "隹" sound, the bird will be tied with a rope (Ma Xulun), the original meaning is tied.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「糸」，「隹」聲，會以繩索綁繫小鳥(馬敍倫)，本義是綁繫。《詩．小雅．白駒》：「縶之維之」，毛亨傳：「維，繫也。」

　　「維」的本義是綁繫，引申之，繫物的大繩又稱「維」，《儀禮．大射》：「中離維綱」，鄭玄注：「侯有上下綱，其邪制躬舌之角者為維。」賈公彥疏：「綱與維皆用繩為之。」《淮南子．天文》：「天柱折，地維絕。」由綁繫引申有維持、維護等義，維持秩序的綱紀、綱要亦稱為「維」。《管子．牧民》：「國有四維……一曰禮，二曰義，三曰廉，四曰恥。」

　　金文用作人名。

　　《說文》：「維，車蓋維也。从糸，隹聲。」段玉裁注：「引申之，凡相系者曰維。」
humanum_short_description: 金文從「糸」，「隹」聲，會以繩索綁繫小鳥(馬敍倫)，本義是綁繫。

維維RS
维维 		tie, secure, fiber, maintain
  • tied thread 糸 used to catch a bird 隹
(Simplified: 维)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 隹 indicates the sound; 糹 (thread) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 糹 [ sī ] silk; thread
    • 隹 [ zhuī ] short-tailed bird; sparrow
①系，連結：維繫。維縶。
②保持：維持。維護。維修。維生素。
③綱：綱維(總綱，亦指法度)。
④數學名詞，幾何學及空間理論的基本概念，通常的空間有“三維”，平面是“二維”，直線只有“一維”。
⑤思考：思維(亦作“思惟”)。
⑥以，因爲：“維子之故，使我不能餐兮”。
⑦文言助詞，用於句首或句中：維新。維妙維肖。
⑧姓氏。
維護 [ wéi hù ]: to defend; to safeguard; to protect; to uphold; to maintain
維持 [ wéi chí ]: to keep; to maintain; to preserve
維修 [ wéi xiū ]: maintenance (of equipment); to protect and maintain
維和 [ wéi hé ]: peacekeeping

金文從「 糸 」，「 隹 」聲，會以繩索綁繫小鳥(馬敍倫)，本義是綁繫。《詩．小雅．白駒》：「縶之維之」，毛亨傳：「維，繫也。」 「 維 」的本義是綁繫，引申之，繫物的大繩又稱「 維 」，《儀禮．大射》：「中離維綱」，鄭玄注：「侯有上下綱，其邪制躬舌之角者為維。」賈公彥疏：「綱與維皆用繩為之。」《淮南子．天文》：「天柱折，地維絕。」由綁繫引申有維持、維護等義，維持秩序的綱紀、綱要亦稱為「 維 」。《管子．牧民》：「國有四維……一曰禮，二曰義，三曰廉，四曰恥。」 金文用作人名。 《說文》：「維，車蓋維也。从糸，隹聲。」段玉裁注：「引申之，凡相系者曰維。」

"Da Shot": "Zhongli Weigang", Zheng Xuan's note: "Hou has the upper and lower Gang, and the evil that makes the horns of the tongue is Wei." "Astronomy": "The pillars of the sky are broken, and the earth is destroyed." It is extended from the tie system to maintain and maintain. The rules and guidelines for maintaining order are also called " maintenance." "tube. Herdsmen": "The four dimensions of state-owned...One is ritual, second is righteousness, third is integrity, and fourth is shame." Bronze writing is used as a person's name. 維字的基本解释

維
wéi
见“维”。

維字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wéi］
［《廣韻》以追切，平脂，以。］
“维1”的繁体字。
(1)系物之大绳。
(2)隅；角落。
(3)纲纪；法度。
(4)系；拴缚。
(5)连结。
(6)维护；扶持。
(7)思念；计度。
(8)乃；是。
(9)由于。
(10)同“唯”。独。
(11)与；和。
(12)助词。用于句首或句中。
(13)生物体中的丝状组织。
(14)数学名词。几何学及空间理论的基本概念。直线是一维的，平面是二维的，普通空间是三维的。在相对论中，所讨论的时空是四维空间。
(15)姓。汉有维氾。见《续通志·氏族六》。

維字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　維； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页927第15
【廣韻】以追切【集韻】【韻會】夷隹切，?音惟。【說文】車蓋維也。　又【博雅】係也。【詩·小雅】縶之維之。【傳】維，繫也。【公羊傳·昭二十四年】且夫牛馬維婁。【註】繫馬曰維，繫牛曰婁。　又【詩·小雅】四方是維。【周禮·夏官·大司馬】以維邦國。【註】維，猶連結也。　又【儀禮·太射禮】中離維綱。【註】侯有上下綱，其邪制射舌之角爲維。　又【爾雅·釋天】太歲在巳曰屠維。　又【前漢·賈誼傳】是猶度江河亡維楫。【註】維，所以繫船。　又【管子·牧民篇】國有四維，一曰禮，二曰義，三曰廉，四曰恥。　又【淮南子·天文訓】帝張四維，運之以斗。　又【楚辭·天問】幹維焉繫。【註】維，綱也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】伊維侯也。【註】發語辭。【韻會】案六經惟維唯三字皆通作語辭，又訓獨，尚書助辭皆用惟字，詩助辭多用維字，左傳助辭用唯字，論語助辭用惟字。新安朱氏曰：惟从心，思也。維糸，繫也。唯从口，專辭也，應辭也。然皆語辭，古書皆通用之。　又地名。【史記·管晏列傳】晏平仲嬰者，萊之夷維人也

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wéi］
["Guang Yun" to chase cutting, flat fat, to. ]
Traditional characters of "维1".
(1) The big rope to tie things.
(2) Corner; corner.
(3) Gang Ji; Law.
(4) Tie; tether.
(5) Link.
(6) Maintenance; support.
(7) Miss; measure.
(8) No; yes.
(9) Because of.
(10) Same as "Wei". alone.
(11) With; and.
(12) Particles. Used at the beginning or in a sentence.
(13) Filamentous tissue in organisms.
(14) Mathematical terms. Basic concepts of geometry and space theory. The straight line is one-dimensional, the plane is two-dimensional, and the ordinary space is three-dimensional. In the theory of relativity, the space-time discussed is a four-dimensional space.
(15) Last name. Han has Uighur Fan. See "Continued History · Clan Six".

wéi
вм. 维
Radicals: 糸, 隹  (thread, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
You tie a piece of thread to your turkey in order to maintain proximity to it. The turkey likes to run away, so you tie a thread to it. This way you can hold the other end and maintain your turkey.
Imagine holding onto a thread that is attached to a turkey. Feel the turkey tug against the thread as you struggle to maintain control.
Reading Mnemonic
The reason the turkey is struggling is because there’s an eagle (い) swooping down to attack the turkey. You try to maintain control, but once you see the eagle as well, you let go of the thread.
Now you and the turkey and the eagle are all bumbling about in pandemonium. You try to maintain order but it’s not possible. What a kerfuffle.

小 (маленький), 幺 (короткая нить), 糸 (нить), 隹 (старая птица)
